pages.title: Description
pages.text: With the Crystal Worldâ€™s inversion of the overworld, many mobs came with it. One of these mobs were the Carrot Pigs. Unable to eat carrots, they found Crystal Beetroots. And so, they ate the crystal beetroots and would transform into Crystal Carrot Pigs. Today, they wander the Crystal Plains only.
